Text:
Breakfast at Tiffany's

SYNOPSIS: Holly Golightly (Audrey Hepburn) is New York call girl, whose allure captivates her upstairs neighbour Paul Varjak (George Peppard), a writer who pays the rent with the help of his own wealthy "sponsor" (Patricia Neal).  

GENRE: Romance 


Actors: Audrey Hepburn, George Peppard, Patricia Neal, Buddy Ebsen, Martin Balsam 

Directors: Blake Edwards 

Format: Anamorphic, Dubbed, PAL, Widescreen 

Region: Region 0

Aspect Ratio: 1.78:1 

Number of discs: 1

DVD Features:

Main Language: [color=Red]English[/color]

Available Audio Tracks: Dolby Digital 5.1, Dolby Digital Mono

Sub Titles: Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Italian, Norwegian, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish

Dubbed Language(s): [color=Red]French, German, Italian, Spanish[/color]
